reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan to be a gorgeous duster that can be dressed up or down, with good quality construction and a comfortable fit that blends well with velvet wardrobes.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: I am so pleased with this garment! It was so such more beautiful than i imagined. & it fits perfect! (true to size) Read more
items.author: Carla F.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feminine and comfortable
items.body: I really love this piece. It looks elegant on, while still being comfortable. Perfect weight, not too heavy and hot, but not flimsy either. I ordered a 2X, and I'm glad I did. I'm 5'5" 190 lbs, usually wear size 18, and wanted to make sure it wouldn't be too tight over a top or dress. I woul've had to return a 1X. I ordered black, and can use it from everything from a Halloween costume piece to a date. It doesn't look costumey at all, just classy and feminine, I'm tempted to buy another in a different color. Read more
items.author: Jolie Hendricks

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but runs large
items.body: This jacket is really pretty and made incredibly well, however it seems to run large. I am 5'7" and typically wear a dress size 10/12. I have a 34G bust size so I was worried about this not fitting well if I sized it too small. The size guide says that the large measures 41 inches around the chest so I figured that was a safe bet. However upon receiving it, it seems like it has a lot more room than that. I can easily close it over my chest with ample room to spare and it was also a bit baggy in the arms and shoulders which made me look frumpy wearing it. I am sending it back and will order it again in a medium this time. It is made in a looser cut and the fabric is very stretchy too. You may want to go down a size in this item. Read more
items.author: Silver Schreffler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering
items.body: Very soft and nicely made. Looks flattering as well. Was not wrinkled at all out of the package. Read more
items.author: Joni

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: This is a very flattering fit! The color is rich and beautiful, and it is very soft to the touch. Not heavy but heavy enough that it will be the perfect layer for a cool Floridian winter day or evening. I also ordered the wine color and can't wait for that to come in. Read more
items.author: MHanlon

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cozy cardigan, medium quality
items.body: Pros: This item was soft and moderately warm. The color was vibrant. Cons: The sewing was uneven and looked sloppy in parts in the front. Also, I noticed that the velvet was sewn on in a direction so that the shiny side shows- in other words, if you run your hands down, it feels smooth whereas if you run your hands upward, you feel resistance. In my opinion, this gave it a cheaper look. I saw a very similar product from a different company where the velvet was sewn at 180 degrees so that you see the richer, matte velvet look. Also, it ran large. I returned it. Read more
items.author: Anon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size no closure
items.body: This is beautiful elegant and the perfect dressy topper for an upscale outfit vs a sweater Read more
items.author: Linda L Reid-Kilzer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely comfortable and flattering!
items.body: I really like these - as a broad shouldered, larger busted, narrow waisted tall girl, it can be difficult to find a casual button down that fits nicely - if it fits my chest and shoulders, it's going to make me look huge around the middle and if it fits my ribcage and waist, it won't button or gaps at the top. These are a nice jersey material (a little thicker than a t-shirt) so it's a lot more forgiving than a cotton or flannel, plus it's super breathable and not particularly wrinkly (I just throw them on a hanger straight out of the dryer and they're all set). I got L & XL and they both work for me (I'm 5'9" - muscular with a 38DD chest) - big enough up top to fit without a stretch (a little more stretch in the large, but not bad) and you can see my waist (the length is nice as well). They're super flattering without looking like you're trying too hard - I bought several more after receiving my first one. Apart from being excellent for my particular build, I would think that they would flatter most womens figures because the material is so forgiving. Be aware that the pattern is printed/dyed into the the material, not woven in like a cotton or flannel shirt - it looks fine and I don't mind it at all, but still good to know. Read more
items.author: krev

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Wine Red, Royal Blue, Black, Green, Iyons Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
